com.skyisland.questmanager.configuration

Class PluginConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.configuration.PluginConfiguration

  • public class PluginConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class for configuration files needed by the plugin. This does not include configuration files for individual quests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PluginConfiguration.PluginConfigurationKey

      • PluginConfiguration

        public PluginConfiguration(java.io.File configFile)

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        public double getVersion()
        Returns the version number of the current configuration file. This is simply the reported version number in the configuration file.

      • getWorlds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getWorlds()

      • getQuestPath

        public java.lang.String getQuestPath()
        Gets the stored quest path information -- where the quest configuration files are stored

      • getKeepOnError

        public boolean getKeepOnError()
        Indicates whether or not the config indicates invalid configuration files, states, or active logs should be kept or removed.

      • getVillagerCleanup

        public boolean getVillagerCleanup()
        Should the plugin remove ALL villager in quest worlds before populating it with quest related NPCs? This is useful to avoid stray villagers escape on error of the plugin, but removed the possibility to use villagers that aren't managed by QuestManager in registered QuestWorlds!

      • getXPMoney

        public boolean getXPMoney()
        Should xp gained in the quest world count as 'money'? When this is enabled, all XP received is instead converted to 'money'. This is represented to the player's client as the level of the player.

      • getMaxPartySize

        public int getMaxPartySize()
        Returns the largest size a party can get

      • getSummonLimit

        public int getSummonLimit()
        Returns how many summons a player is allowed to have

      • getAllowTaming

        public boolean getAllowTaming()
        Can players tame animals in the QuestWorlds?

      • getUsePortals

        public boolean getUsePortals()
        Whether or not multiverse portals should be used and tracked. When this is on, players will be returned to the last portal they used when leaving registered QuestWorlds.

      • getAdjustXP

        public boolean getAdjustXP()
        Returns whether or not the number of XP mobs drop should depend on their level Note: Currently, this requires that the name of the mob have "Lvl ###" in it! TODO

      • getMagicEnabled

        public boolean getMagicEnabled()
        Returns whether or not magic is set to be enabled

      • getStartingMana

        public int getStartingMana()
        Gets the specified default mana allotment, for new players

      • getMagicRegenDay

        public double getMagicRegenDay()
        Returns the amount of mp to regen in the day. Negative amounts indicate a percentage to regen rather than a constant (-(return)%)
        Returns:
        The amount to regen; positive values indicate a constant, negative a rate (out of 100)

      • getMagicRegenNight

        public double getMagicRegenNight()
        Amount to regen at night
        Returns:
        The amount to regen; positive values indicate a constant, negative a rate (out of 100)

      • getMagicRegenOutside

        public boolean getMagicRegenOutside()
        Returns:
        whether or not mp should regen only when outside

      • getMagicRegenKill

        public double getMagicRegenKill()
        The amount of mp to regen when a player gets a kill
        Returns:
        The amount to regen; positive values indicate a contant, negative a rate (out of 100)

      • getMagicRegenXP

        public double getMagicRegenXP()
        The amount to regen per xp picked up by a player
        Returns:
        The amount to regen; positive values indicate a constant, negative a rate (out of 100)

      • getMagicRegenFood

        public double getMagicRegenFood()
        Amount to regen when a player consumes a food item
        Returns:
        The amount to regen; positive values indicate a constant, negative a rate (out of 100)

      • getMenuVerbose

        public boolean getMenuVerbose()
        Indicates whether or not menus should print out extra messages about expired menus. This can be used as a security feature to avoid players from spamming old menus!

        public int getSkillCap()
        Returns the plugin-wide skill cap. This is the maximum level any skill can achieve. Defaults to 100 if it is absent from the config.
